96 
97 
98 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointInSegment(double position) const
99 {
100  return ((m_a * position + m_b) * position + m_c) * position + m_d;
101 }
102 
103 
104 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationInSegment(double position) const
105 {
106  return (m_a * (3 * position) + m_b * 2) * position + m_c;
107 }
108 
109 
110 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationBegin() const
111 {
112  return m_c;
113 }
114 
115 
116 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationEnd() const
117 {
118  return m_a * 3 + m_b * 2 + m_c;
119 }
120 
121 
122 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointBegin() const
123 {
124  return m_d;
125 }
126 
127 
128 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointEnd() const
129 {
130  return m_a + m_b + m_c + m_d;
131 }
132 
133 
134 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointBegin() const
135 {
136  return m_d + m_c / 3;
137 }
138 
139 
140 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointEnd() const
141 {
142  return m_c + m_d + (m_b - m_c) / 3;
143 }
144 
145 
146 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentFirst(CSplineSegment& result) const
147 {
148  result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
149  result.m_b = m_b * 0.25;
150  result.m_c = m_c * 0.5;
151  result.m_d = m_d;
152 }
153 
154 
155 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentSecond(CSplineSegment& result) const
156 {
157  result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
158  result.m_b = m_a * 0.375 + m_b * 0.25;
159  result.m_c = m_a * 0.375 + (m_b + m_c) * 0.5;
160  result.m_d = m_a * 0.125 + m_b * 0.25 + m_c * 0.5 + m_d;
161 }
162

168  return m_a;
